languages.text: "Меня гнетут мысли о будущем Дома Орселлио. Ненависть и недоверие, копившиеся годами... вновь и вновь приводят к кровопролитию".
"I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."
languages.original_text: "Меня гнетут мысли о будущем Дома Орселлио. Ненависть и недоверие, копившиеся годами... вновь и вновь приводят к кровопролитию".

traits.locale_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."

traits.locale_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我满脑子都在想着奥赛罗家族的未来。多年的仇恨和怀疑……导致了一次又一次的流血事件。”
languages.original_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."

traits.locale_text: “我满脑子都在想着奥塞罗家族的未来。多年的仇恨和怀疑……导致了一次又一次的流血事件。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « L'avenir de la maison Orsellio occupe toutes mes pensées. Tant de haine et de méfiance... Et pour quel résultat ? Des années et des années de massacres. »
languages.original_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."

traits.locale_text: « L'avenir de la maison Orsellio occupe toutes mes pensées. Tant de haine et de méfiance... Et pour quel résultat ? Des années et des années de massacres. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Me consumen los pensamientos sobre el futuro de la casa Orsellio. Años de odio y desconfianza... han conducido al derramamiento de sangre una y otra vez».
languages.original_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."

traits.locale_text: «Me consumen los pensamientos sobre el futuro de la casa Orsellio. Años de odio y desconfianza... han conducido al derramamiento de sangre una y otra vez».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家の未来を考えると頭がいっぱいです。嫌悪と不信が何年も続き、流血の惨事が何度も繰り返されているのです」
languages.original_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家の未来を考えると頭がいっぱいです。嫌悪と不信が何年も続き、流血の惨事が何度も繰り返されているのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Mich verzehren Gedanken über die Zukunft des Hauses Orsellio. Jahre voller Hass und Misstrauen ... haben wieder und wieder zu Blutvergießen geführt."
languages.original_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."

traits.locale_text: "Mich verzehren Gedanken über die Zukunft des Hauses Orsellio. Jahre voller Hass und Misstrauen ... haben wieder und wieder zu Blutvergießen geführt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi'nin geleceğini düşünmek beni yiyip bitiriyor. Nefret ve şüpheden kopamadığımız onca yıl... Tekrar tekrar kan dökülmesine neden oldu."
languages.original_text: "I am consumed by thoughts of the future of House Orsellio. Years of hatred and distrust... have led to bloodshed again and again."

traits.locale_text: "Orsellio Hanesi'nin geleceğini düşünmek beni yiyip bitiriyor. Nefret ve şüpheden kopamadığımız onca yıl... Tekrar tekrar kan dökülmesine neden oldu."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
